website_summaries.verdict: If you need to cut through bolts, nails, or rivets up to a certain size, this product can take care of it.
pros: Will get through most materials with a diameter of one-fourth inch or less
The lever action adds to the ease of use and its tough construction ensures it gets the job done without extra elbow grease
cons: Don't expect this tool to do the job of full-size bolt cutters

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on other cutters.  This is it.
customer_reviews.text: I had knock off cutters that look like these, but it still took a lot of effort to cut 6 gauge copper wire for bonsai. It wasn't until I started unwiring trees that I realized how much I'd be using wire cutters. I decided to stop being cheap and buy a wire cutter and man am I happy. It's like cutting 12 gauge. So effortless. As usual being cheap just ends up costing me more money because now I have an obsolete wire cutter. I keep that cheapo out in the garage for impromptu work and keep these bad boys in the tool pouch when it's time to get serious.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid hook cutter
customer_reviews.text: I have used the lesser priced bolt cutters in the past, they just don't get the job done and get worse with age. This cutter is my second, one for my shop, the other has been going strong for several in my boat without issue. If you get a hook in you with the fish still attached, this is the tool you want for sure.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Boldus

customer_reviews.title: Cuts fish hooks with ease
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep in my boat toolkit so that I would always have something that can cut off a fish hook, regardless of how big the hook is. First thing I did when these cutters arrives was to cut one of my bigger hooks, and they cut through it like it was butter. Just the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Knipex 7102200 8-inch Lever Action Mini-Bolt Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Got these mainly for changing out hooks on Salas lures. These cut through 7/0 hooks like butter! Can be used to clip hooks in an emergency situation by removing the eyelet if deep set in skin..ewww....
customer_reviews.author: Ranchibi

customer_reviews.title: Mini bolt cutters
customer_reviews.text: These are everything that knipex claims them to be !!! I’ve cut 1/4 stainless bolts with them and no marring to jaws !!! Great value , highly recommend .....
customer_reviews.author: Alicia W.

customer_reviews.title: Best bolt cutter available in its size.
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick. Whether working around the house; urban survival; escape and evasion - whatever you need a bolt cutter in this size for, its tough and what you are looking for. Can't beat the price (except for trash that wont work after you use it once).
customer_reviews.author: Anon Y. Mous

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable cutting ability!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, product is very good! Bought for use on my high tensile fence. The cutter works great cutting at the base of the jaw, cutting with the tip will take extra effort! I would highly recommend this product, the size bs what it could cut is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cutters in middle of jaws.
customer_reviews.text: Has a real good cut off in the middle of jaws but if you are cutting nails like i did just using the front part of jaws, their lacking, i end up using a small pair of bolt cutters to get the job done. Their outstanding cutting ability is achieved using the middle where you get good leverage
customer_reviews.author: J. Creasy

customer_reviews.title: Quality has ALWAYS!😍 been proven to be the Foundation of a Successful Product. I'm gonna put one in each vehicle for Emergencie
customer_reviews.text: Quality has ALWAYS!! been proven to be the Foundation of a Successful Product. The Knipex Family of Perfectly made tools are reasonably priced considering you'll never need to buy that tool Ever again. Indestructible! Durable! Dependable! I'm gonna buy one for each vehicle just in case I hook myself again. If someone else hooks themselves then I will put on my cape and Equip myself with the Knipex Mini-Bolt Cutters and Save the Day. 😌
customer_reviews.author: Marlena Beaudoin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Used it to cut/trim 5mm metal plate.... Only applied medium strength No problem. No dent mark on blade so far Well worth it. Never doubt Knipex quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kok

customer_reviews.title: good pair of metal cutters
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Knipex tools when I worked on my car in college, thought they went out of business. These are worth the price. You will see the diff when you cut wire or steel rods. I used them to add shelving to a couple of closets. They make a nice clean cut unlike the cheap Chinese manufactured cutters I borrowed from a neighbor, which left jagged metal and did not seem to cut completely so you had to bend the metal to break it apart. Still have my old Knipex tools - 30 years later and they still perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Heydekrug

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad for 12.5 gage Double Strand Pasture Wire
customer_reviews.text: Not Bad for 12.5 gage Double Strand Pasture Wire. Defiantly better than the cutters in fencing pliers. Look like decent quality. Let me put a couple seasons on them then I will resubmit.
customer_reviews.author: High In The Rockies

customer_reviews.title: Best small bolt cutter
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing bolt cutters. Same Knipex quality has one might expect. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Marlow

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of Snap-on tools and I like Knipex pliers and cutters better.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly good
customer_reviews.text: Extremely compact and will cut through just about anything you can fit in the jaws, only limited by how hard you can squeeze
customer_reviews.author: gordy roth

customer_reviews.title: Well, it just doesn't get any better than Knipex...
customer_reviews.text: So convenient since they cut through things that ordinarily require a much larger tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable and cut 9 wire like butter!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a fellow coworker. He is very satisfied with the pliers. He had lost a pair he owned before.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Briseno

customer_reviews.title: Powerful cutting with little effort
customer_reviews.text: I bought for cutting 16 gauge chainmaille rings. Normally I could only cut one at a time but with this I can cut 3 at a time. I could cut more but only 3 fit in the cutting area. I get more done with less effort. Only downside is I wished I bought one with a spring in it. It is on the heavier side so having to open it up repeatedly wears on the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Dreckman

customer_reviews.title: The Best Money Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: After using other brands these are the best money can buy. Definitely professional quality, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: atlas

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good quality tool. The blades stay sharp no matter how much abuse I put them through. I would buy again if needed. but at this rate I don't think so !
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gives a smooth and easy cut, goes through wire like butter. Feels great in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Noel

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I expected the handle to have a spring for holding in the open position so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works awsome
customer_reviews.text: I use them almost everyday cutting all kinds of fencing Cuts the high tensile strength net wire And it cuts like butter Own several pair
customer_reviews.author: Jeff SchroedTer

customer_reviews.title: A beast!
customer_reviews.text: These jokers will flat out cut some fence wire. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Ali Merk

customer_reviews.title: Fine for 1/8" Rod, but not much more
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through 1/8" rod easily. Will not handle 3/16 rod without significant hand strain, if even that. Nice to have and a high quality item but limited in it's use.
customer_reviews.author: dbx820

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best tool to have with me on the ranch. Cuts thru wire non stop.
customer_reviews.author: Bria

customer_reviews.title: Knipex
customer_reviews.text: The Knipex Mini Bolt Cutters are high quality cutters, they are a little bit too small for the chain I bought them to cut, but they get the job done with some force.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: well worth the 50 bucks
customer_reviews.text: i work on helicopters and whenever i have to do big steel cotter pins i grab these i used to use my dikes squeze down with both hands and press into my legs to break one end at a time hoping not to break my dikes. now its a diffrent story these cut through them with no effort at all i can cut them with one hand
customer_reviews.author: cristoval

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cut through chain links with relative ease. Great cutter for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ky63Doc

customer_reviews.title: The Best Money Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: Having Previously Owned Knipex Tools, I Expected These To Perform As Well As My Adjustable Pliers, But Was Hesitant Because Of The Price $40+. Once I Received Them I Knew It Was Money Well Spent Ive Easily Cut Grade 5 1/4-20 Bolts With Ease Along With 1/4" Wire Cable, They Cut Copper Wire Like A Knife Thru Hot Butter & The Blade Remains Sharp
customer_reviews.author: Momma96085

customer_reviews.title: but yes these do cut tig welding wire even better than regular 8 inch Knipex
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe, but yes these do cut tig welding wire even better than regular 8 inch Knipex.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts 5/32" stainless tig wire like a beast
customer_reviews.text: Hard to kill ! Cuts 5/32" stainless tig wire like a beast!! A must have for back to back cuts !
customer_reviews.author: Gary Branham

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hook cutters!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use on my bass boat to cut hooks if an emergency arrives and I get one stuck in my hands again. These are way enough cutting power to tackle any of the bass fishing hooks that I use. Brian
customer_reviews.author: PoPs

customer_reviews.title: mini bolt cutter
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this tool! works like magic! How did I ever live witout this tool? One of the first tools I grab now when doing jewelry and art projects ...
customer_reviews.author: Andi Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Owned earlier version of this tool
customer_reviews.text: Before the full dawn of the internet these tools were much harder to obtain. About 20 plus years ago I bought the much older version of this tool. Just loves using it for its cutting power and its ease of use. This is an updated version with more comfortable handles. Great tool and expensive!!
customer_reviews.author: Zeb

customer_reviews.title: Cuts thick wire like a knife through butter
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these mini bolt cutters. They are the perfect size and they cut like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Pack Rat

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected, but does the job great.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cutters I've ever used, i use them for cutting my own stainless steel chainmaille rings. I only have one problem... no spring!!! that was about the only thing wrong with them. but other than that the best cutters I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Sievert

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Knipex cutters are the best - well worth the money. I have used them for years at work and found that there's no substitute for them in my home shop.
customer_reviews.author: A. Customer

product_meta.title: KNIPEX Tools - CoBolt Compact Bolt Cutter, Multi-Component (7102200)
product_meta.description:
Style:8-Inch Comfort GripMade In Wuppertal-Cronenberg, Germany. In Addition To Quality, Innovation And Performance, Other Important Cornerstones Are Sustainable Actions And Value-Guided Orientation.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The compact bolt cutters have lever action center cutters to cut material such as bolts, nail and rivets up to 5.2 mm. The comfort grip handles are made of a two color dual component material for a comfortable grip. The lever action designed mechanism provides a lever ratio with low friction. This results in a cutting performance 20 times higher than the hand force applied. Required 61% less effort. The cutting edges are induction hardened at approximately 64 HRC to cut through soft wire up to 6.0 mm; medium hard wire maximum 5.2 mm; hard wire up to 4.0 mm and piano wire up to a maximum diameter 3.6 mm.
feature_bullets: The Number 1 Choice Of Tradesman Worldwide
Comfortable In Use And Quality Assured Design
Fit To Match The Needs In The Shop, At Home Or In The Service Field
Each Tool Is Proven And Tested For Durability And Function In Real World Use And Conditions
